document.full_text: novak djokovic is playing like he has wings as he prepares to challenge for a first french open title starting on sunday, according to the man who discovered him as a teenager.
document.title: winged wonder djokovic prepares for toughest challenge
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic is playing like he has wings as he prepares to challenge for a first french open title starting on sunday, according to the man who discovered him as a teenager.
